summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl
Review Date: 2020/11/01
Store: lootaan
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'}
Review Text: These are the longest nail tips I own. They are long and sturdy and they fit bigger nail beds. I compared them to other nail tips I have and these are bigger, i definitely recommend for people with bigger nail beds.
Review Title: Long and Sturdy
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 20pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool
Review Date: 2020/12/02
Store: tiggell
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Size': '20 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Tiggell', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.85 x 2.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '795853588163'}
Review Text: I LOVE working on polygel, however whenever i use dual forms they tend to pop up and it makes it hard to hold down while putting my finger into the lamp so i decided to try these out. I have yet to use polygel with them but they hold pretty good with a full cover nail on top of my natural nail. I definitely recommend these for beginners who struggle with dual forms.
Review Title: Great clips for polygel
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold
Review Date: 2020/12/02
Store: OVLUX
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'OVLUX', 'Special Feature': 'Energy Efficient', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Connectivity Technology': 'USB', 'Package Dimensions': '9.4 x 8.3 x 4.3 inches; 1.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '765453999881'}
Review Text: This nail lamp is stunning. I love the finish and the gold color. It has a nice weight to it, it does not feel cheap it works fantastically, and you can also take off the bottom if you'd like to use it for a pedicure. I definitely recommend this nail lamp it is not only great but beautiful as well. A definite eye catcher.
Review Title: The beautifulest of them all
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YIZIJIZI 2 Pack Reusable Shower Cap, Large Shower Caps for women, Double Layer Waterproof Hair Caps for Long Thick Hair Bath Caps for Hair Care (pink & grey)
Review Date: 2020/12/14
Store: YIZIJIZI
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'YIZIJIZI', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.91 x 5.51 x 3.15 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 5.51 x 3.15 inches; 3.07 Ounces'}
Review Text: These satin looking shower caps are very pretty. They feel nice and smooth look satin and they are also 100% water proof. They have 2 layers one being the satin looking material and the inside being plastic so water does not enter. It also came with 5 additional regular disposable shower caps to use under the cap for extra security. These caps are a must, they look super chic and you won't be spending money regularly on disposable ones, it's a win win.
Review Title: Pretty and Functional
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Color Changing Gel Nail Polish Set Spring Summer Mood Nail Polish for Starter and Professional 6 Colors Pink Red Blue Yellow Purple Brown Manicure Kit for Valentine’s Day Girlfriend Gift
Review Date: 2020/12/15
Store: ASKITO
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ASKITO', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting,Long-lasting', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.62 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces'}
Review Text: These gel polishes are okay. The consistency is a bit weird , you only need one coat but the bottles feel empty. They are very very light compared to other gel polishes around the same size. These do change colors but only with hot water and for a few seconds, after they go back to normal which i thought wasn't very fun. They are nice colors however, i just don't know if you get a good amount of products as the bottles are dark and feel almost empty. Regardless if you're into color changing polishes these do technically work.
Review Title: Okay Gel Polishes
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Tweezers for Eyebrows, MORGLES 5PCS Tweezers for Women Precision Tweezers Set with Eyebrow Brush Leather Case for Eyebrow Ingrown Hair Removal
Review Date: 2020/12/22
Store: MORGLES
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.73 x 4.06 x 0.75 inches; 7.83 Ounces', 'UPC': '616010018807', 'Manufacturer': 'MORGLES'}
Review Text: These eyebrow tweezers are great. They are sharp, have a nice weight and work great. They pluck eyebrow hairs easily and grab even the smallest of hairs effortlessly. I really liked this set and will definitely recommend these for people who do their own eyebrows.
Review Title: amazing tweezers
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CONBOLA Make Up Organizer 5 in 1 Dresser Organizer,Portable for Lipstick and Jewlry ,Makeup Organizer and Temporary Makeup Brush Holder,Multi-purpose for Girl Women.36.6cm18cm.(Blue)
Review Date: 2020/12/22
Store: CONBOLA
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Silicone', 'Special Feature': 'Portable', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Brand': 'CONBOLA', 'Mounting Type': 'Tabletop Mount', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '15.08 x 7.44 x 1.5 inches; 1.65 Pounds', 'UPC': '750226660013'}
Review Text: This make up organizer is perfect for traveling or if you do not have much space for a bigger mirror. It is small enough to carry around and makes applying makeup very easy. I love how it has silicone like holders for your lipsticks or eyeliners and brushes as well as jewelry. This is definitely something worth investing in. I got this so I can take it on the go to retouch my makeup or do it if I need to have it done last min. It is something you can easily store inside your car or office/ work area. I most definitely recommend this to make applying makeup on the go easier.
Review Title: All you need
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Portable Travel Bottles Keyring Fruit Holders 50ml Refillable Empty Containers Perfect for Kids to Carry Hand Sanitiser (4pcs)
Review Date: 2020/12/24
Store: PetSinc
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 5.47 x 1.81 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '782910026546'}
Review Text: These hand sanitizer bottles are a great size to attach to a purse/backpack/car as it is small but not as small as a bath & body works so it is guaranteed to last quite a bit before needing a refill. I love how they have attachers to attach to bags and such that have fruits and match their overall color. It's very cute definitely great if you have multiple kids as each can get their own color/fruit and they will not fight over which is who's. I like these to leave around so I always have access to hand sanitizer.
Review Title: Good to carry around
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Biutee Nail Stamping Plates 5pcs Templates With Stamper Scraper Set Nail Art Plates set animal flower Christmas halloween design
Review Date: 2021/01/04
Store: Biutee
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 5.75 x 1.18 inches; 5.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TOOL-AT-755', 'Manufacturer': 'Biutee'}
Review Text: These stamp plates are very cute, I like how there is a variety and a theme to each one. This is the perfect set to have for different occasions/holidays. It comes with everything you need except the polish. This works great and I really like that you can take nail designs to the next level with these. I used regular nail polish with these and it worked great but they do sell special polish for stamping plates as well.
Review Title: Variety of stamp plates
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set
Review Date: 2021/01/12
Store: LUXAZA
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LUXAZA', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream Eyeshadow', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 5 x 0.87 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: These eyeshadow sticks are very smooth and creamy. You have to slide it on a couple of times to get good pigmentation payoff however once you use the brush to blend it out the color slowly fades and leaves you with a sheer looking shadow. You will need to reapply a couple of times to have good coverage. Overall the colors and finish are cute however the execution could use some work. I recommend this if you want eyeshadow that is not too in your face or for tweens.
Review Title: Pretty metallic shimmery shadows
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Disney Frozen - Townley Girl Mega Nail Set with Nail Dryer Foldable Gift Set for Parties, Sleepovers and Makeovers
Review Date: 2021/01/16
Store: Townley Girl
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.18 x 11.06 x 2.8 inches; 1.87 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'FZ2169GA', 'UPC': '719565451850'}
Review Text: This Frozen nail kit is really perfect for kids, especially kids under 10. I got this as a joke for my girls night since our work does not allow our nails to be done, I figured this kit would be perfect and it was. It is very sheer despite the colors in the bottles looking very pigmented. It also peels extremely easy so acetone is not needed to remove the polish which is great for little kids. Overall, quality wise it isn't the best, for an adult, for a child this is perfect. I recommend this kit for your kids, it's very cute and fun!
Review Title: Perfect for little kids
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BELLA MODA Sponges Blender Puff for Powder, Liquid and Cream Makeup 4PCS Purple Beauty Blending Sponge Foundations Powders Wet and Dry Used
Review Date: 2021/01/27
Store: BELLA MODA
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BELLA MODA', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Material': 'Sponge', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '5.8 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '823544676230'}
Review Text: These makeup sponges are great. Lately i’ve preferred using a brush to apply foundation but these sponges make me want to go back to beauty blenders. They are great for blending my eye primer and foundation but I prefer them for when I am baking my face. I like that this comes with 4 beauty blenders so you do not have to constantly be washing your only one. The packaging is also very cute and very gift-able in my opinion. I recommend these for people who like to use beauty blenders or even to include in a makeup gift basket.
Review Title: Great Packaging
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ROSEGIN 23 Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set with Glossy and Matte Top and Base Coat Soak Off Gel Polish Colors Pink Red Green Neon Long Lasting Nail Gel Polish
Review Date: 2021/01/27
Store: ROSEGIN
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ROSEGIN', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Yellow,Orange,Green,Red,Pink', 'Finish Type': 'Glitter,Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting,Peel Off,Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '23', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.77 x 10.12 x 1.14 inches; 1.78 Pounds'}
Review Text: These Rosegin gel polishes are small, around the same size as the modelones. There is a good variety of colors and some have glitter. I like this set because you get almost all the colors in a rainbow without breaking the bank and an added bonus, depending on how you look at it, is that they are small so you’re more likely to use it all instead of the polish just sitting there. The one thing for me was that the blue glitter polish was very sheer and I needed like 4 coats to build it up but the other colors worked great. I definitely like this little set.
Review Title: Small Rainbow
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Biutee Nail Mirror Powder4 Boxes 8 Colors 0.5g with 4 Brushes Nail Chameleon Powder Nail Glitter Nail Chrome Powder Manicure Unicorn Chrome Pigments
Review Date: 2021/01/27
Store: Biutee
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 5.59 x 1.97 inches; 0.02 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have seen some reviews saying that this does not work, however for me it worked and applied perfectly. I only needed to rub it two times and it applied nicely and it looks very smooth as well. My powder did not break off like others, I’d imagine it is because I was gentle with it. You do not need to rub it hard for it to apply nicely. I did have a layer at the bottom of gel polish so I do not know if that helped adhere the chrome but for me it worked great and I recommend it.
Review Title: Good performing Mirror Powder
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dienalls Dried Flowers for Nails, Nail Art Supplies for Women Acrylic Nail Decorations, with Tweezers Nail Art Accessories, 72 Pcs 3 Boxes Natural Dried Pressed Flowers
Review Date: 2021/01/29
Store: Dienalls
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.64 x 4.49 x 1.38 inches; 2.82 Ounces'}
Review Text: These flowers for nails are nice. They each come in their own container and there is a variety of shape sizes and colors. The one thing I noticed is that they totally feel like plastic flowers you’d find at a dollar store. I thought these would be dried flowers but regardless they are nice and usable for nail designs and resin alike.
Review Title: Great for resin and nails alike
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Yayoge Poly Gel Nail Kit 4 Colors Builder Gel for Nails with Nail Art Tools Nail Extension Gel with Slip Solution All In One Kit for Nail Manicure Beginner Starter Kit DIY at Home
Review Date: 2021/01/29
Store: yayoge
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {}
Review Text: This polygel kit is great for beginners and avid polygel users alike. It includes 7 different polygels but 5 of those 7 are around the same shade. I definitely like that this kit includes a small UV lamp along with both dual and nail forms. The dual forms on this kit are very curved which are not really my style but if you enjoy dual forms but do not like it as curved you can easily buy them on amazon separately . The polygels in this kit are on the skinny side. I think these are definitely worth it on sale and would recommend you buy them then.
Review Title: Variety Variety Variety
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: JIADEL Gel Nail Polish Colors Set,Confetti Glitter Gel Nail Polish With No Wipe Base and Top Coat,Soak Off UV LED Nail Art Salon Starter Manicure Kit
Review Date: 2021/03/01
Store: JIADEL
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'JIADEL', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '16', 'Liquid Volume': '0.17 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '11 x 9 x 1 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '11 x 9 x 1 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '642940399488'}
Review Text: This jiadel gel polish set brings some gorgeous unique colors to my collection. It is very pigmented, I only swatched it once and it was full coverage. Some of the polishes in this set are very unique like the ones with fur or hair on them, I’ve never seen polishes like that before. They apply smoothly and are a nice good thick consistency. Do not let the size of the bottle fool you, these gel polishes may be packaged small but they pack a good punch. I definitely recommend this to beginners or people who like adding unique shades to their collections.
Review Title: Some interesting Gel Polishes
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

The dual forms on this kit are very curved which are not really my style but if you enjoy dual forms but do not like it as curved you can easily buy them on amazon separately . The polygels in this kit are on the skinny side. I think these are definitely worth it on sale and would recommend you buy them then.

    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a clear preference for high-quality, aesthetic products with a noted emphasis on functionality and durability, especially in beauty and personal care items. They consistently rate products with average ratings of 4.0 and above, showing a preference for practicality without compromising on style. 

A recurring theme in their purchases is a focus on nail care and enhancement tools, indicating a strong interest in DIY manicures and nail art. Their choices reflect a desire for both variety (as seen in gel polish sets and stamping plates) and reliability (favoring sturdier nail tools and efficient drying lamps). 

In terms of quality, the shopper prefers items that feel well-made and offer good value, often commenting on the longevity and performance of products. Price sensitivity appears moderate; they are willing to spend on essentials but prioritize sales and value propositions. 

Overall, the core preferences reveal a trend towards practical beauty solutions that enhance personal grooming experiences, coupled with an appreciation for products that present an appealing aesthetic and are reliable for frequent use.

target_interaction.title: Essential
target_interaction.text: These makeup removing washable pads are definitely made out of quality material. They were built to last. They are very thick and soft and plush. Super easy to use and to wash. I love using my makeup removing oil with these washable pads. They have certainly become a staple to my beauty routine.
target_interaction.title_meta: Topwon 4.5Inch Makeup Remover Pads Washable Cotton Face Cleansing Pad for Sensitive Skin 3 Packs Facial Washing Puffs to Remove Mascara Foundation Lipstick
features: Plush Facial Washing Pad: Outside fleece cotton and inner sponge. With water or facial cleanser, gently remove your facial makeup, such as mascara, foundation, sunscreen, lipstick and eye shadow.

Reusable Face Cleansing Wipe: More than 99% of environmentalists choose reusable makeup remover pads. You can frequently use it to save more disposable face cleansing pads, just a small choice can save more trees. We recommend wash each time after use and air it

Sensitive Skin Face Wipes: The inner sponge can support the surface of the pure cotton makeup remover, making it easier to grasp. The pure cotton material is non-irritating to the skin and can effectively relieve sensitive skin and reduce acne. Make your skin more refreshed and comfortable after removing makeup

As Baby Bathing Sponge: Absorbent and soft baby bathing pad can work well with shower gel and create abundant foams, smooth touch feeling. I use it for my baby, works great. Designed with a hanging hole for your easy store
description: Make up removal pads are easily exfoliating and remove all makeup, creams, sunscreen & cosmetics when wet.It can be facial makeup cleansing towel, eye makeup remover cloths, foundation make-up remover wipes, lipstick removing cleaning puff. Compact size is easy for travel or camping A ecofriendly makeup removing solution for you and the environment Makeup removal pads and facial cleaning puffs Cotton fleece washing face cloth pad with inner sponge Perfect for washing with only water or facial cleanser to help people cleaning face, makeup remove Washable pad we recommend wash with soap each time after use Size: 4.5Inch*0.8Inch,Please choose your order quantity
